channel.title: Defence bonuses
channel.description: How would I implement defence bonuses onto my server? Don't tell me to search this doesn't exist or the topics that have this don't work.

item.title: Defence bonuses

item.description:
@Username wrote:

No I mean high def equals makes you harder to kill def bonuses.

Read full topic

item.title: Defence bonuses
item.dc:creator: @bubabaa bubabaa
item.description:
@bubabaa wrote:

If you mean you want to edit the defense bonuses you simply go in item.cfg and search for the item you want to edit - using d chain now.
After the name, examine info you should see some numbers - I’ll try explaining what they mean…

148195.415050151	148195.415050151	198945.35621087	0	0	0	-15	0	120	110	120	-3	95	0	0

the 3 first piles of numbers is the price of the item (I think :)), the next 5 are attack bonuses.
The following 5 numbers are defense bonus then comes strength and prayer bonus.

Hope you at least understood anything

Read full topic
